nodes.text: The T-6 shuttle, also called the Jedi T-6 shuttle, was an unarmed transport used by the Jedi Order. An older design, it saw greater use during the Clone Wars. By the time of the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire, the shuttle cockpit was used in the design of the A/SF-01 B-wing starfighter.[source?]

After the Battle of Endor, Ahsoka Tano used one of these starships to travel to Lothal and pick up Sabine Wren, in order to begin their search for the Jedi Ezra Bridger. A number of T-6 shuttles were retrofitted with armament and participated in the Battle of Exegol as part of the citizens' fleet of over 16,000 starships to aid the Resistance in their fight against the Final Order.
The T-6 shuttle first appeared in Star Wars: The Clone Wars.
The online guide for "Revival," the first episode of The Clone Wars: Season Five, incorrectly identifies an Eta-class shuttle as a T-6 shuttle.
